Action.author: troyronda
Action.body: The peer command and arguments is not part of Go SDK.

Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: Can you clarify which version of Fabric / Build Your First Network you're using? The --peerAddresses and --tlsRootCertFiles flags are only available starting in Fabric 1.2. Did you download the 1.2.0-rc1 binaries following the doc here: http://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/en/latest/install.html ?

Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: latest covers the documentation for the master (aka development) branch of the codebase. If you go to https://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/ , it defaults to the current GA version (release-1.1 at the moment).

Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: ~nileshdeotale Is it alright with you to close this JIRA now?

Action.author: nileshdeotale
Action.body: ~wlahti thanks for the clarification regarding documentation. I've closed this now.
